memberships.title: Memberships
memberships.placeholder: Which consortia are you a member of? Memberships enables these organizations to receive data across its membership.

strategicDirections.title: Strategic Directions
strategicDirections.placeholder: What are your current strategic priorities? Skilltype uses these to align staff skills and activity to track progress.

productsAndServices.title: Products and Services
productsAndServices.placeholder: What products and services does your organization purchase? Skilltype uses these to track instituitonal knowledge across your teams.
